Text: Trump orchestrating an assault on peaceful protesters so he could hold a bible in front of a church for a photo op is a gross abuse of power ; arguably a violation of the 1st Amendment's right to peaceably assemble. Trump MUST be prosecuted for his crimes against the people.
"American History isn't a fairy tale, with a guaranteed happy ending." I see Biden, unlike the current president, has done the course reading.

Dear @realDonaldTrump: You are reckless if you deploy our active duty military against Americans. Are Apache helicopters going to fire rubber bullets? Are machine guns going to fire blanks? You will increase the chances of dead Americans. We need you to de-escalate, not escalate.

"name one time Trump was racist," Okay, I will1973: The Nixon administration sued Trump for refusing to rent to black people.1980s: Trump's casinos were accused of hiding the black staff when Trump visited.

Eyewitness account of today's White House attack on peaceful protesters is that tear gas came from a Black Hawk helicopter. Trump is using our military to attack American citizens. @SenSchumer @SpeakerPelosi @senatemajldr please do something NOW.

This is no longer just about the killing of George Floyd.This is no longer about the nature of protests and violence.This is about a mighty nation rising up against a man who has divided, denigrated and disrespected his own people and his country.This is about Donald Trump.
